comment:
Optimization Problem:This problem involves finding the best solution among a set of feasible solutions to minimize or maximize a certain objective function, in this case, the total amount of gas consumed.
Constraint:A condition that must be satisfied in order to meet the requirements of the problem. In this case, the constraint is that at least 50% of the trips must be made by speed boats.
Objective Function:A function that needs to be optimized or minimized in an optimization problem. In this case, the objective function is the total amount of gas consumed.
